titleStmt.title: Orders taken, and enacted, for orphans and their porcions. anno. M.D.L1 [sic].
Acts and orders. 1551-10-13
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: in Powles Churchyard, by Iohn Cawood, printer to the Queenes Maiestie [i.e. by Thomas East?,

notesStmt.note: Ostensible printer's name and address from colophon. "Cawood is styled printer to the Queen's Majesty as in [STC] 16701 and undoubtedly did print a Marian ed. of an Edwardian text, both of which are now lost. The present item is considerably later and has the same woodcut 'F' as 16708"--STC addendum.
Running title reads: Orders enacted for orphanes.
The last two leaves are blank.
Identified as STC 16705+ on UMI microfilm reel 217, as STC 18843a on reel 1002 (filmed following STC 20552 without spaces; omitted from reel guide), and as 18843a on reel 1250.
Reproductions of originals in the Guildhall Library, London, England, and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
